definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: father of David (etym. dub.; Ol:§ 277 f. conj. [[יֵשׁ יׇהּ]]; We:1Sa 14:49 [[ישׁי]] = [[אישׁי]] = [[יִשָָׁי]] (but see this))—[[יְשַׁי]] 1Sa 16:3 + 29 t.; [[יִשָָׁי]] v:1Sa 16:19 + 10 t.; LXX Iessai; [[יִשַׁי]]([[וְ]]) 1Ch 2:13; —† [[יִשַׁי בּיח־]] [[הַלַּחְמִי]] jesse the Bethlehemite 1Sa 16:1, 1Sa 16:18 (´[[בֶּן־ישׁי וגו]], of David), 1Sa 17:58 †; [[ישׁי]] also 1Sa 16:3 + 14 t. 1Sa 16:17; † son of [[עוֹבֵד]] acc. to Ru 4:17, Ru 4:22, Ru 4:22 = 1Ch 2:12; [[ד]]([[י]])[[דָּוִ]] [[בֶּן־ישׁי]] 2Sa 23:1, 1Ch 10:14, 1Ch 29:26, Ps 72:20; [[אֱלִיאָב בֶּן־ישׁי]] 2Ch 11:18; elsewhere [[בֶּן־ישׁי]] alone = David, 1Sa 20:27, 1Sa 20:30, 1Sa 20:31, 1Sa 22:7, 1Sa 22:8, 1Sa 22:9, 1Sa 22:13, 1Sa 25:10, 2Sa 20:1, 1Ki 12:16 = 2Ch 10:16, 1Ch 12:18; [[נֶּוַּע יִשׇָׁי]] Is 11:1; [[שׁׂרֶשׁ יְשֵׁי]] v:Is 11:10 of Jesse as ancestor of future (Messianic) king†.
